response.explain: The previous action code has successfully executed the subtask of grasping the ham hock. The robot now has the ham hock in its inventory. The next step is to put the ham hock in the stockpot.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the ham hocks from the fridge
(3) Grasp the ham hock
(4) Put the ham hocks in the stockpot
(5) Cook the ham hocks in the stockpot
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 4: Put the ham hocks in the stockpot
    stockpot = registry(env, "stockpot_81")
    ham_hock = registry(env, "ham_hock_82")
    put_ontop(robot, ham_hock, stockpot)
    donothing(env)
